file_insights.description: Added extensive documentation about HiddenState, conveyance metrics, and measurement processes

patterns_discovered: Technical system explanation with usage guidelines
gotchas_discovered: Hidden states can be memory-intensive (8-32KB each)
Need for lazy loading or streaming when processing multiple hidden states
Measurements exist parallel to conversations, not nested

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Document conveyance metrics and system integration

recommendations: Consider creating memory management strategies for hidden state processing
Develop external analysis services for measurement computation
Create visualization tools for conveyance metrics tracking
Implement monitoring for Beta thresholds across conversations
